verses.verse: לְדָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> of David מִ֫זְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לַֽ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> [is] the LORD'S הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> The earth וּמְלוֹאָ֑הּ <S%H4393><s%> and the fulness תֵּ֝בֵ֗ל <S%H8398><s%> thereof the world וְיֹ֣שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> and they that dwell בָֽהּ׃

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ה֭וּא <S%H1931><s%> he עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon יַמִּ֣ים <S%H3220><s%> it upon the seas יְסָדָ֑הּ <S%H3245><s%> For he hath founded וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon נְ֝הָר֗וֹת <S%H5104><s%> it upon the floods יְכוֹנְנֶֽהָ׃ <S%H3559><s%> and established

מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who יַעֲלֶ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> Who shall ascend בְהַר־ <S%H2022><s%> into the hill יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah וּמִי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who יָ֝קוּם <S%H6965><s%> may stand בִּמְק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> country קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H6944><s%> in his holy

נְקִ֥י <S%H5355><s%> He that hath clean כַפַּ֗יִם <S%H3709><s%> hands וּֽבַר־ <S%H1249><s%> and a pure לֵ֫בָ֥ב <S%H3824><s%> heart אֲשֶׁ֤ר ׀ <S%H834><s%> Who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> has not נָשָׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> who hath not lifted up לַשָּׁ֣וְא <S%H7723><s%> unto vanity נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> his soul וְלֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> not נִשְׁבַּ֣ע <S%H7650><s%> nor sworn לְמִרְמָֽה׃ <S%H4820><s%> deceitfully

יִשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> He shall receive בְ֭רָכָה <S%H1293><s%> the blessing מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD וּ֝צְדָקָ֗ה <S%H6666><s%> and righteousness מֵאֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> from the God יִשְׁעֽוֹ׃ <S%H3468><s%> of his salvation

זֶ֭ה <S%H2088><s%> This דּ֣וֹר <S%H1755><s%> This [is] the generation [דֹּרְשֹׁו כ] (דֹּרְשָׁ֑יו <S%H1875><s%> ask ק) מְבַקְשֵׁ֨י <S%H1245><s%> him that seek פָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thy face יַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> O Jacob סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

שְׂא֤וּ <S%H5375><s%> Lift up שְׁעָרִ֨ים ׀ <S%H8179><s%> O ye gates רָֽאשֵׁיכֶ֗ם <S%H7218><s%> your heads וְֽ֭הִנָּשְׂאוּ <S%H5375><s%> and be ye lift up פִּתְחֵ֣י <S%H6607><s%> doors עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> ye everlasting וְ֝יָב֗וֹא <S%H935><s%> shall come in מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the King הַכָּבֽוֹד׃ <S%H3519><s%> of glory

מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Who זֶה֮ <S%H2088><s%> he מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Who [is] this King הַכָּ֫ב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> glorious יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עִזּ֣וּז <S%H5808><s%> strong וְגִבּ֑וֹר <S%H1368><s%> and mighty יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD גִּבּ֥וֹר <S%H1368><s%> mighty מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> in battle

שְׂא֤וּ <S%H5375><s%> Lift up שְׁעָרִ֨ים ׀ <S%H8179><s%> O ye gates רָֽאשֵׁיכֶ֗ם <S%H7218><s%> your heads וּ֭שְׂאוּ <S%H5375><s%> even lift [them] up פִּתְחֵ֣י <S%H6607><s%> doors עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> ye everlasting וְ֝יָבֹא <S%H935><s%> shall come in מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the King הַכָּבֽוֹד׃ <S%H3519><s%> of glory

מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> Who ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he זֶה֮ <S%H2088><s%> is this מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Who is this King הַכָּ֫ב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> of glory יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Jehovah צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> He מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> he [is] the King הַכָּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> of glory סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah
